{
  "layers": [
    {
      "name": "Scrolling Contents Layer",
      "bounds": [800, 600],
      "contentsOpaque": true,
      "backgroundColor": "#FFFFFF",
      "invalidations": [
        [300, 0, 200, 200],
        [0, 0, 200, 200],
        [200, 80, 100, 100],
        [200, 50, 100, 100]
      ]
    }
  ]
}
